text: The Singapore Grand Prix is a Formula One race staged in the Marina Bay area of Singapore, the race is Formula One's first night race. The first race was won by Spanish driver Fernando Alonso of the Renault F1 team on 28 September 2008. == Winners == === Formula One === ==== Multiple winners (drivers) ==== Wins Driver Years won 5 Sebastian Vettel 2011, 2012, 2013, 2015, 2019 4 Lewis Hamilton 2009, 2014, 2017, 2018 2 Fernando Alonso 2008, 2010 ==== Multiple winners (constructors) ==== Wins Constructor Years won 4 Mercedes 2014, 2016, 2017, 2018 3 Ferrari 2010, 2015, 2019 Red Bull 2011, 2012, 2013 ==== By year ==== Date of birth for the current source of the program that has been issued for the year of this race that had taken place in marina bay.
